title: Martin Luther King Speeches and Sermons - ORIGINAL - COMPLETE -
description:
*** For Good&#039;s sake SEED, DISTRIBUTE, STUDY. PLEASE. NOW. HURRY. ***

540228 Rediscovering Lost Values, Detroit MI 2-28-54.

551205 First Mont Imp Assoc Mass Meeting Address 12-5-55.

561104 Paul\&#039;s Letter to American Christians, Montgomery Ala 11-4-56.

570407 The Birth of a New Nation, Dexter Ave Baptist church, Montgomery Ala, Pt 1; Pt 2. 4-7-57.

570517 Give us the BAllot, Lincoln Memorial, 5-17-57.

571117 Loving Your Enemies, Montgomery Ala 11-17-57.

630000 A Knock at Midnight, 1963.

630500 Address at the Freedom Hall Rally, Cobo Hall, Birmingham Campaign,Detroit, May 1963.

630828 I have a Dream, March on Washington for Jobs, Lincoln Memorial, Washington DC 8-28-63.

630918 Eulogy for the Young Victims of the 16th Street Baptist Church Bombing, Birmingham Ala 9-18-63.

641210 Nobel Peace Prize Acceptance Speech, 12-10-64.

650325 Address at the Conclusion of the Selma to Montgomery March, 3-25-65.

650704 The American Dream, Ebenezer Baptist Church, Atlanta GA 7-4-65.

660605 Guidelines for a Constructive Church, Ebenezer Baptist Church, Atlanta GA 6-5-66.

670404 Beyond Vietnam-A Time to Break Silence, Riverside Church, NYC 4-4-67.

670409 The Three Dimensions of a Complete Life, New Covenant Baptist Church, Chicago IL 4-9-67.

670816 Where Do We go from Here, Atlanta GA, 8-16-67.

670827 Why Jesus Called a Man a Fool, Mount Pisgah Missionary Baptist Church, Chicago, IL 8-27-67.

680204 The Drum Major Instinct, Ebenezer Baptist Church, Atlanta GA 2-4-68.

680303 Unfulfilled Dreams, Ebenezer Baptist Church 3-3-68.

680331 Remaining Awake Through a Great Revolution, National Cathedral Washington Dc 3-31-68.

680403 I\&#039;ve Been to the Mountaintop, Mason Temple Church of God in Christ, Memphis Tenn 4-3-68.
